default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Let me go! Let me go! I'm the biggest rascal of DisCity! You can't capture me!

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: There must be more exciting adventures waiting for me!

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: My goodness, is this really mine? Can I go farm in Paradeisos now?

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Where are we going for an adventure this time?

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Victory! Let's celebrate! I want some cola!

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Cough cough... I let them off easy on purpose!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Taste this!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Sob... I'm not done playing yet...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Yoohoo, Chief! When can we get up to some mischief together? Hurry up, I'm so bored.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Chief, I want to drink some cola! Please... I promise to brush my teeth!

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Great! As long as I can fight every day, I'll be able to eat, drink and sleep well. The Bureau is such a great place - um... wait! Laziness seems like a bad thing, too! Marvelous! I'm the biggest rascal in DisCity!

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: My grandpa said he always wanted to be a cowboy and explore the world, but in the end, he never left his hometown and remained a farmer all his life. To help him realize his dream, I stole and wore his hat! Haha!

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: DisCity is huge! I couldn't see the edge of the city even after running for three hours! In my hometown, I could plow all the farm plots combined within three hours... so, when can I go to Paradeisos to farm?

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Chief, if you run into thugs, just drop my name! It won't be of much use, but at least it'll give you some psychological support!

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I've been busy completing missions recently, so no time for mischief. If this keeps up, DisCity will forget my name. Well... it's decided! I'm going to stay up all night!

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Chief! Let's go farming! Let's go treasure hunting! Let's go fight those strange creatures! I can't wait!

default.title: Idle
default.text: Ahhh... when are we leaving? I'm already sleepy from waiting.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: What is it? Did my clothes get stained? No?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Got any new plans?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Off we go to an adventure in DisCity!

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Done! Quick, praise me!

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Start running!

default.title: Deploy
default.text: I'm coming!

peppy_shepherdess.title: Level Up
peppy_shepherdess.text: Hmm... "Care for Sheep Step by Step"? Ohh I get it, so that's how I can keep my lambies happy and healthy!

peppy_shepherdess.title: Obtain Attire
peppy_shepherdess.text: Hey Chief, come look at my little lambs! My baaaa-rilliant fluffy pookie! Aren't they just adorable? So, you wanna herd them with me maybe?

peppy_shepherdess.title: Greeting
peppy_shepherdess.text: Hey Chief, over here! The sunshine, the breeze, and my lambsâ€”they're all so softy 'n fluffy! Ahh, what a life!

peppy_shepherdess.title: Ordinary Contact 1
peppy_shepherdess.text: Let's see, today's jobs... Take my lambies to the new ranch, clean up the pen... Oh right! And pack up the morning milk for the farmer's market!

peppy_shepherdess.title: Ordinary Contact 2
peppy_shepherdess.text: Do I still wanna be the biggest rascal in DisCity? Sure thing! Rascals can be awesome ranchers too, y'know! Hmph, say I can't, I'm gonna chuck a lamb poop at you!

peppy_shepherdess.title: Idle
peppy_shepherdess.text: One sheep, two sheep, three... Ugh nope, I'm not gonna fall asleep counting sheep!

peppy_shepherdess.title: Annoyed
peppy_shepherdess.text: Wait what? What do you mean my face's soft 'n fluffy like a ball of wool. No way! My lambs are waaay fluffier! For sure!

peppy_shepherdess.title: Special Attention
peppy_shepherdess.text:
Hehe, looks like you're enjoying the ranch too! I haven't seen a view like this since I left home. It feels so good to be back in nature.
Thanks for bringing me here, Chief. Let's stay until you clock off, okay?
